title: AS New Club
text:
New Club is a <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> club of <a href="Martinique">Martinique</a>, based in the village <a href="Petit-Bourg%20%28Martinique%29">Petit-Bourg</a> in the <a href="Communes%20of%20France">commune</a> <a href="Rivi%C3%A8re-Sal%C3%A9e">Rivière-Salée</a>.
Founded in 1948, they play in Martinique's second division, the <a href="Martinique%20Promotion%20d%27Honneur">Martinique Promotion d'Honneur</a>.
